flawed_nl_solution:
The medical cost comes out to 45*10+250=$<<45*10+250=700>>700
Insurance covers 700*0.8=$<<700*0.8=560>>560
So he has to pay 700-560=$<<700-560=143>>143
Added to the cost of the trip he has to pay 1200+143=$<<1200+143=1343>>1343
#### 1343

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 140, not 143. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
